channel.title: OpenTelemetry-Native Traces, Metrics, and Logs in a single pane
channel.description: A single tool for all your observability needs - APM, logs, metrics, exceptions, alerts, and dashboards powered by a powerful query builder.
channel.item: https://www.signoz.io/blog/justifying-a-million-dollar-observability-bill Is a $1 million Datadog bill worth it? https://www.signoz.io/blog/justifying-a-million-dollar-observability-bill undefined Thu, 12 Oct 2023 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (SigNoz Inc) operationsobservability
